item.title: Welcome to Go
item.description: Golang as common language In January 2020 I took the chance to present my talk “Welcome to Go” about the Go Programming Language at Guild42.ch. Over 85 developers from around Berne where interested in the topic. Until there I was telling only Swiss Post stuff about Golang and argued about why the language is very useful. I felt ready to speak to more people about my and Swiss Posts journey with Go.
